note:
Hi! I'm an oldish cis het software developer in the UK, married to Helen. I've recently discovered that I'm #ActuallyAutistic.

If you have something in your profile, I'll generally accept your follow request. I don't always follow back; you needn't follow back if you don't want to.

Avatar is a genuine photo of a Jersey street sign, which says "Hill Street" in English and "Three Pigeons Road" in French, signifying absurdity.

Stimming playlist (which I need to rework, now that Songwhip is gone): <https://write.as/fediman/songs-to-play-on-repeat>

name: For
value: Science, reason, medicine, vaccines, masks, Free software, tolerance, goodwill, honesty, respect
